Name: VR Darts Zone
About the game: Playing darts is one of the best ways to spend a great time with your friends. We developed VR Darts Zone to give you that experience in Virtual Reality. So put your HTC Vive on and visit chill out room in our pub. The game offers you: 4 game modes (Classic 301, Classic 501, Killer, Round the World), play against computer or friends (local multiplayer), up to 4 local players, 3 difficulty levels, practice mode, jukebox with option of playing your own music, detailed, interactive pub environment.
